item.description:
Benjamin C. Margolis 3rd Annual Memorial Silent Auction / Wine Tasting


The Benjamin C. Margolis 3rd Annual Memorial Silent Auction / Wine Tasting to benefit the Connecticut Childrenâ€™s Medical Center (CCMC) and St. Francis Hospital will be held on Sunday, May 31, 2009 at Congregation Beth Israel, 701 Farmington Avenue, West Hartford from 6:00 PM to 9:00 PM. A light supper will be provided by Olive Garden. A $10.00 suggested donation at the door is requested. Cash or check only please. For more information please contact Michelle Margolis at 860 232-4069 or michzam@sbcglobal.net. Public Welcome!
